src:
Lider ne da tron, Zlatibor previsok za Pazarce (VIDEO)
Kolabara sa dva igrača više pobedila Smederevo i dospela na četvrto mesto

03 Nov 2019

Zlatibor nikako ne da tron. Sjajna ekipa iz Čajetine vezala je peti trijumf u Prvoj ligi Srbije i to nad solidnim timom Novog Pazara od 1:0.
Pred oko 700 gledalaca na terenu Švajcarija na srpskoj planinskoj lepotici ekipa trenera Ristanovića dominirala je tokom svih 90 minuta, ali joj je na kraju samo jedan pogodak bio dovoljan za trijumf.
Pogađali su Zlatiborci i prečku u prvom poluvremenu, golman gostiju Divac je imao pune ruke posla, ali je lideru posao olakšalo i rano isključenje gostujućeg fudbalera Milanovića već u 30. minutu.
Utakmica je odlučena tačno na isteku jednog časa igre kada se lopta odbila na ivicu šesnaesterca, a Uroš Stamenić je smestio iza leđa golmana Novog Pazara.
Ovim trijumfom Zlatibor je zadržao dva boda prednosti u odnosu na prvog pratioca ekipu Metalca.  



Zanimljiv duel viđen je i u Lazarevcu gde je Kolubara jedva savladala Smederevo sa 2:1 i to sa čak dva igrača više. Rasplet ove utakmice otpočeo je u 71. minutu kada je isključen gostujući fudbaler Stanimirović, a domaći igrač Milisavljević sa bele tačke doneo prednost svom timu.
Da je meč gotov učinilo se i u 79. minutu kada je isključen i drugi Smederevac Rakić, ali su uporni gosti i sa dva igrača manje stigli do izjednačenja u 82. preko Nikole Đorđevića. Ipak, domaćini su do pobede ujedno i četvrtog mesta došli u 89, a strelac je bio Miloš Milisavljević.  

SRBIJA 2 - 17. kolo

PetakBačka – Dinamo Vranje  2:0 (1:0)/Žakula 23, 77/
SubotaRadnički Kragujevac – Kabel  0:1 (0:1)/Izečukvu 33/
Sinđelić – Zemun  2:1 (1:0)/Ilić 15, Joković 87 – Vukajlović 55p/
Trajal – Budućnost  2:1  (1:1)/Juf 39, Kecap 60 – Perić 5/
Metalac - Radnički Pirot  1:0 (1:0)/Ješić 10/
NedeljaZlatibor - Novi Pazar 1:0 (0:0)/Stamenić 60/
Kolubara - Smederevo 2:1 (1:0)/Milisavljević 72. penal, 89 - Đorđević 82/
Ponedeljak13.30: Žarkovo - Grafičar



Foto: Screenshot
text:
Zlatibor leader not too throne, too high for Pazar people (VIDEO)
Kolabara with two players beat Smederevo more and reached fourth place

03 Nov 2019

Zlatibor by no means gives a throne. The great team from Cajetina tied their fifth triumph in the First League of Serbia over a solid team of Novi Pazar 1-0.
In front of about 700 spectators on the Swiss mountain in the Serbian mountain beauty, Coach Ristanović's team dominated throughout the 90 minutes, but in the end, only one shot was enough for the triumph.
The Zlatibor players were hit and a crossbar in the first half, the goalkeeper Divac had his hands full of work, but the job was also made easier by the early shutdown of the away footballer Milanovic in the 30th minute.
The match was decided exactly at the end of one hour of play when the ball bounced to the edge of the penalty area, and Uros Stamenić placed behind the back of the goalkeeper of Novi Pazar.
With this triumph, Zlatibor maintained a two point lead over Metalac's first runner-up.



An interesting duel was also seen in Lazarevac, where Kolubara could barely beat Smederevo 2: 1 with two more players. The end of this game started in the 71st minute when the away footballer Stanimirovic was ruled out and the home player Milisavljevic brought the advantage to his team from the white spot.
The match was over in the 79th minute when the second Smederevac Rakic was ruled out, but the persistent guests and two players were less able to equalize in the 82nd over Nikola Djordjevic. However, the hosts also came in fourth place in 89, with Milos Milisavljevic as the scorer.

SERBIA 2 - Round 17

PetakBacka - Dinamo Vranje 2: 0 (1: 0) / Zacula 23, 77 /
SaturdayRadnicki Kragujevac - Kabel 0: 1 (0: 1) / Izechukvu 33 /
Sindjelic - Zemun 2: 1 (1: 0) / Ilic 15, Jokovic 87 - Vukajlovic 55p /
Trajal - Buducnost 2: 1 (1: 1) / Juf 39, Kecap 60 - Peric 5 /
Metalac - Radnicki Pirot 1: 0 (1: 0) / Jesic 10 /
NedeljaZlatibor - Novi Pazar 1: 0 (0: 0) / Stamenić 60 /
Kolubara - Smederevo 2: 1 (1: 0) / Milisavljevic 72nd Penalty, 89 - Djordjevic 82 /
